==Unlockables==
===Cost===
This event features three pages of [[Cosmetics|rewards]] that can be unlocked using Medals earned from completing missions and [[Major Orders|Orders]]. Each page requires an increasing number of Medals to unlock.
* Total Medals needed to unlock all pages: {{Currency|Medals|275|notext}}
* Total Medals needed to buy all items: {{Currency|Medals|679|notext}}
* Total [[Super Credits]] available from pages: {{Currency|SC|300|notext}}
* Super Credits needed to unlock all items: {{Currency|SC|1,000|notext}}
